bill_title: to provide for a statute of limitations in certain negligence actions against regional airports.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for a statute of limitations in certain negligence actions against regional airports. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 15-2 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any action to recover damages for personal injury or death caused by the negligence of a regional airport authority, created pursuant to § 50-6A-2, may only be commenced within two years of the alleged negligence. This Act is prospective in application. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for a statute of limitations in certain negligence actions against regional airports. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 15-2 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any action to recover damages for personal injury or death caused by the negligence of a regional airport authority, created pursuant to § 50-6A-2, may only be commenced within two years of the alleged negligence. The provisions of chapter 3-21 do not apply to any regional airport authority. This Act is prospective in application. BILL HISTORY 1/20/98 First read in House and referred to Judiciary. H.J. 118 1/28/98 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 1/28/98 Judiciary Do Pass, Passed, AYES 9, NAYS 4. H.J. 270 1/29/98 Motion to Amend, Passed. H.J. 306 1/29/98 House of Representatives Do Pass Amended, Failed, AYES 35, NAYS 30. H.J. 307 1/29/98 Intent to reconsider. H.J. 307 1/30/98 House of Representatives Reconsidered. H.J. 319 1/30/98 House of Representatives Deferred to another day. H.J. 319 2/2/98 House of Representatives Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 50, NAYS 15. H.J. 342

That chapter 15-2 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any action to recover damages for personal injury or death caused by the negligence of a regional airport authority, created pursuant to § 50-6A-2, may only be commenced within two years of the alleged negligence. This Act is prospective in application. BILL HISTORY 1/20/98 First read in House and referred to Judiciary.
